item.title: Projects ðŸ›
item.description: Personal ðŸ˜Ž Link to heading These are some of the projects I’ve worked on my spare time, they are also the ones I had the most fun developing. EPHScores Link to heading An application for medical emergency first responders in Portugal. It provides an easy way to calculate various scores and evaluations of the patient, soo to ease and accelerate the help and care. Play Store CAP Parser library Link to heading CAP is a XML message-formatted based communication focussed one structuring the main aspects of any given emergency in a easy to read/easy to exchange message.

item.title: About Me ðŸ“œ
item.description: Highly motivated and obsessively focused, I guess, is the best way to describe me. I commit myself entirely to every single project I work on because, for me, software development is more than just my job; it is also my hobby and my passion. My main fields of interest are networking, web3 technologies, and cybersecurity. Iâ€™ve been programming since I was 15, and from that point onward, I knew that technology was my vocation.
